Maintenance is closely connected with the Configuration Management process and software asset management and is performed concurrently with the other Technical processes. NOTE ISO/IEC/IEEE 14764:2006 Software Engineering — Software Life Cycle Processes — Maintenance and ISO/IEC 16350, Information technology — Systems and software engineering — Application management, provide additional detail.
